code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import logo from'../images/HigtechLogo.png';import'../Css/DashboardSidebar.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var DashboardSidebar=function DashboardSidebar(){var location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo",className:"logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navigation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/dashboard",className:"nav-button ".concat(location.pathname==='/dashboard'?'active':''),children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/companydashboard",className:"nav-button ".concat(location.pathname==='/companydashboard'?'active':''),children:"Company"})]})]})});};export default DashboardSidebar;
